name: rausachcore-starter
description: Modern Fullstack Starter Kit with Next.js + NestJS + GraphQL + Prisma + Redis + TailwindCSS v4

scripts.dev:rausach: cp .env.dev.rausach backend/.env && cp .env.dev.rausach frontend/.env.local && concurrently "bun run dev:rausach:backend" "bun run dev:rausach:frontend"
scripts.dev:rausach:backend: cd backend && PORT=12001 bun run dev
scripts.dev:tazagroup: cp .env.dev.tazagroup backend/.env && cp .env.dev.tazagroup frontend/.env.local && concurrently "bun run dev:tazagroup:backend" "bun run dev:tazagroup:frontend"
scripts.dev:tazagroup:backend: cd backend && PORT=13001 bun run dev
scripts.dev:timona: cp .env.dev.timona backend/.env && cp .env.dev.timona frontend/.env.local && concurrently "bun run dev:timona:backend" "bun run dev:timona:frontend"
scripts.dev:timona:backend: cd backend && PORT=15001 bun run dev
scripts.build:rausach: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cp .env.prod.rausach frontend/.env.local && bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:rausach:image: docker build -f backend/Dockerfile.production -t rausach-backend:latest backend && docker build -f frontend/Dockerfile -t rausach-frontend:latest frontend
scripts.build:rausach:save: docker save rausach-backend:latest | gzip > docker-images/rausach-backend.tar.gz && docker save rausach-frontend:latest | gzip > docker-images/rausach-frontend.tar.gz
scripts.deploy:rausach: bun run build:rausach && bun run build:rausach:image && bun run build:rausach:save && ./scripts/deploy/deploy-rausach.sh
scripts.build:tazagroup: cp .env.prod.tazagroup backend/.env && cp .env.prod.tazagroup frontend/.env.local && bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:tazagroup:image: docker build -f backend/Dockerfile.production -t tazagroup-backend:latest backend && docker build -f frontend/Dockerfile -t tazagroup-frontend:latest frontend
scripts.build:tazagroup:save: docker save tazagroup-backend:latest | gzip > docker-images/tazagroup-backend.tar.gz && docker save tazagroup-frontend:latest | gzip > docker-images/tazagroup-frontend.tar.gz
scripts.deploy:tazagroup: bun run build:tazagroup && bun run build:tazagroup:image && bun run build:tazagroup:save && ./scripts/deploy/deploy-tazagroup.sh
scripts.build:timona: cp .env.prod.timona backend/.env && cp .env.prod.timona frontend/.env.local && bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:timona:image: docker build -f backend/Dockerfile.production -t timona-backend:latest backend && docker build -f frontend/Dockerfile -t timona-frontend:latest frontend
scripts.build:timona:save: docker save timona-backend:latest | gzip > docker-images/timona-backend.tar.gz && docker save timona-frontend:latest | gzip > docker-images/timona-frontend.tar.gz
scripts.deploy:timona: bun run build:timona && bun run build:timona:image && bun run build:timona:save && ./scripts/deploy/deploy-timona.sh
scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.test: bun run test:backend && bun run test:frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:backend && bun run lint:frontend
scripts.docker:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.app.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.infra.yml down
scripts.setup: bun install && cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules bun.lockb backend/bun.lockb frontend/bun.lockb
scripts.db:migrate:rausach: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset:rausach: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed:rausach: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio:rausach: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma studio
scripts.db:push:rausach: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate:tazagroup: cp .env.prod.tazagroup backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset:tazagroup: cp .env.prod.tazagroup backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed:tazagroup: cp .env.prod.tazagroup backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio:tazagroup: cp .env.prod.tazagroup backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma studio
scripts.db:push:tazagroup: cp .env.prod.tazagroup backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate:timona: cp .env.prod.timona backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset:timona: cp .env.prod.timona backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed:timona: cp .env.prod.timona backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio:timona: cp .env.prod.timona backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma studio
scripts.db:push:timona: cp .env.prod.timona backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:pushforce: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && npx prisma db push --force-reset
scripts.db:backup: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && bun run prisma/backup.ts
scripts.db:restore: cp .env.prod.rausach backend/.env && cd backend && bun run prisma/restore.ts

author: rausachcore Team
